auras.name: Soulspike Ward
auras.description: the soulspike devourer and all allies in the aura gain a bonus to all defenses equal to one-half the number of soulspiked spirits impaled on the creature

vulnerable.description: when the soulspike devourer takes radiant damage, its newest soulspiked spirit gets a saving throw to escape

powers.name: Claw
powers.hit: If the attack reduces a humanoid living target to 0 hit points or fewer, the target disappears and becomes a soulspiked spirit impaled on the devourer (see soulspiked spirit).

powers.name: Soul Shatter
powers.recharge: recharges when the soulspike devourer uses a devour spirit
powers.hit: the target is stunned until the end of the soulspike devourer's next term.  Aftereffect: Target is weakened (save ends)

powers.name: Devour Spirit
powers.description: The soulspike devourer instantly kills the oldest soulspiked spirit and regains 75 hit points.  A creature's dead body appears in a space adjacent to the devourer.

powers.name: Soulspiked Spirit
powers.description: The soulspiked devourer begins the encounter with one soulspiked spirit and impale up to four soulspiked spirits.  A soulspiked spirit can take no action and escapes when the devourer is destroyed.  When a creature's spirit escapes, its body appears in an unoccupied space adjacent to the devourer, in the same state is was when it disappeared.
